message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000. It's a great deal, and I believe it's worth the price. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have a limited budget

Bob, I understand you have a budget constraint, but unfortunately, $9,000 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down a little further to $11,000. This is still a great deal for you, and it allows me to make a fair profit. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to come down, but $11,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $10,500. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement
